definition: pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: Show all articles on this topic.
sentences.chinese: 顯示所有關於這個主題的文章。

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 過去的那個休賽期，有很多關於科比想被交易的報道。

sentences.english: Yes, it was about the car auxiliary power plants, am I right?
sentences.chinese: 當然，那是關於轎車輔助動力設備，是嗎？

sentences.english: You don't need me to explain the luck, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 關於幸運之神眷顧，我猜完全用不着解釋了。

sentences.english: There are a lot of exaggerations and falsehoods about the Indians.
sentences.chinese: 關於印第安人有著許多不實之辭及謊言。

sentences.english: Just a few things off the top of my head regarding upgradable bags.
sentences.chinese: 一些關於揹包升級的想法一直在我腦海裏盤旋。

sentences.english: But Mr. Viniar declined to discuss in detail the impact that the new regulations would have on Goldman, saying that it was too early to give any guidance on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 關於新法案對高盛的影響，維尼亞拒絕詳細置評。

sentences.english: There are two religion clauses in the First Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 《第一條修正案》裏有兩條關於宗教的條款。

sentences.english: It's a famous poem about baseball.
sentences.chinese: 這是一首關於壘球的名詩。

sentences.english: There is a little bit of information of swine hepatitis E virus in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國，有少量關於豬戊型肝炎病毒的信息。

sentences.english: Let's take a linear function of x, y, and z.
sentences.chinese: 我們來看關於x，y，z的一個線性方程。

sentences.english: Speaking: discuss the following questions about smoking in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 就下列關於在工作場所吸菸的問題進行討論。

sentences.english: The book treats the problem too sketchily.
sentences.chinese: 該書關於這一問題寫得太簡略。

sentences.english: The most commonly asked question concerning cellulite is how to get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 關於瘦身，人們最常問到的問題就是如何消除脂肪。

sentences.english: Where have I read something about dungeons?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪讀過過關於地牢的東西啊？

sentences.english: Sara is asking Yang Pei about her future plans.
sentences.chinese: 薩拉正在問楊佩關於未來的打算。

definition: to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
